name: Coral Prince
description:
Description

Coral Prince is a platformer and a metroidvania prototype game made for Grenny Game Jam. 

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Dash

Mouse Click / E  - Attack

Credits

AydanG and necrocultist - Development

silatasan - Intern Developer :P

DahliaLupa and silatasan- Art

tensorenes - Music and SFX
